languages.text: "Артефакт Гало не должен был достаться такому ничтожеству. Я его заберу".

traits.locale_text: "Артефакт Гало не должен был достаться такому ничтожеству. Я его заберу".

languages.text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."
languages.original_text: "Артефакт Гало не должен был достаться такому ничтожеству. Я его заберу".

traits.locale_text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."
"The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."
"The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."
"The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."
"The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."

languages.text: 「光輪の装置をそんな弱者は与えられるべきではなかったのだ。これは{mf|俺|私}がもらおう」
languages.original_text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."

traits.locale_text: 「光輪の装置をそんな弱者は与えられるべきではなかったのだ。これは{mf|俺|私}がもらおう」

languages.text: «El dispositivo Halo no debería estar en manos de alguien tan débil. Me lo quedo».
languages.original_text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."

traits.locale_text: «El dispositivo Halo no debería estar en manos de alguien tan débil. Me lo quedo».

languages.text: “光晕装置不该落在这种废物手上，我要把它带走。”
languages.original_text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."

traits.locale_text: “光晕装置不该落在这种废物手上，我要把它带走。”

languages.text: « Un artefact du Halo n'aurait pas dû tomber entre les mains d'un être aussi pitoyable. Je vais le récupérer. »
languages.original_text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."

traits.locale_text: « Un artefact du Halo n'aurait pas dû tomber entre les mains d'un être aussi pitoyable. Je vais le récupérer. »

languages.text: "Das Halogerät hätte nicht an einen solchen Schwächling gehen sollen. Ich nehme es an mich."
languages.original_text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."

traits.locale_text: "Das Halogerät hätte nicht an einen solchen Schwächling gehen sollen. Ich nehme es an mich."

languages.text: "Hale Cihazı, böylesine iradesiz birinin eline düşmemeliydi. Aldım gitti."
languages.original_text: "The Halo Device should not have gone to such a weakling. I will take it."
